metadata.name: We Feel Good
metadata.description:
Hi, I'm Faramarz, a barista who loves coffee and giving people a good feeling
I made a video for myself several times
From 16 hours of work, I first wanted to post it on Instagram, but when I saw the deep feeling of the video, I burst into tears , seeing how beautiful it feels to see people feel good.
I decided to make a time-lapse and convert the film to 4 minutes NFT

When I saw this world pays a lot for worthless things
I wanted to see what is price of 16 hours of good feeling
.......

Due to upload restrictions
I had to upload a preview on site, original video was almost 700mb and it is impossible to upload on foundation.
I will send the original 4 minutes version of the video to anyone who buy this NFT
